snippet: The firm has set a deadline for the next round of takeover bids, which could lead to the £1 billion ($1.6 billion) sale of the 135-year-old exchange.
abstract: The firm has set a deadline for the next round of takeover bids, which could lead to the £1 billion ($1.6 billion) sale of the 135-year-old exchange.

headline.main: London Metal Exchange Sets New Deadline for Bids
